pages.text: 26|137|‘Eya purbarartisakalarahe sbabhara.
26|138|‘Ami ketiya'o sastipraapta naha'om’.
26|139|Eteke sihamte te'omka asbikara karaile, phalata ami sihamtaka dhbansa karailo. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|140|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
26|141|Chamuda sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
26|142|yetiya sihamtara bhatr chalehe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
26|143|‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
26|144|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa.
26|145|‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata.
26|146|‘Iyata yi ache tata tomalokaka niraapade erai diya ha’bane
26|147|‘udyana arau jharnasamuhata
26|148|‘sasyaksetrata arau sukomala joka bisista khejura baganata
26|149|‘arau tomaloke nipunatara saite pahara kati yibora grha nirmana karaicha.
26|150|‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka anusarana karaa.
26|151|‘Arau tomaloke simalanghanakarai sakalara nirdesara anugatya nakaraiba
26|152|‘yisakale prthiraita biparyaya srsti karae arau sansodhana (tatha santi sthapana) nakarae’.
26|153|Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi haicha yadukaraibilakara an'yatama.
26|154|‘Tumi dekhuna amara darae'i ejana manuha, seye tumi yadi satyabadi horaa tente eta nidarsana lai aha’.
26|155|Te'om ka’le, ‘e'ijani haiche (nidarsaniya) uta, iyara babe ache pani khoraara pala, arau tomalokara babe'o ache eta nirdharaita dinata pani khoraara pala.
26|156|‘Arau tomaloke iyara kono anista sadhana nakaraiba, yadi (anista sadhana) karaa tente maha dirasara sasti tomalokara oparata apatita ha’ba’.
26|157|Tathapi'o sihamte se'i utajanika badha karaile, parainamata sihamta anutapta ha’la.
26|158|Eteke sastiye sihamtaka graasa karaile. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechibhage'i mumina nahaya.
26|159|Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
